text: Kapelle, Zeelandic: Kapelle or Kapel'n, is a village and municipality on the former island of Zuid-Beveland, Province of Zeeland, the Netherlands. In 2017 the municipality had about 13,000 people. In 2016 the village had about 7,000 people. == Famous people == * Jan Peter Balkenende (born 1956), former Prime Minister Category:Municipalities of Zeeland Category:Settlements in Zeeland
title: Kapelle
